title: Tibetan Metal Bowl Sound (relax or meditate)
description:
This ancient sound therapy has been helping people relax and sleep for thousands of years. 

Want access to an ad-free, 8-hour version of this episode? Try Deep Sleep Sounds Premium free for 7 days: https://sleepsounds.supercast.com/.
